beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: Let's go through the scores. Value. 4 out of 5. Good value. More bang for your buck than most. $60 registration includes park entry, breakfast, lunch, and dinner according to research. Adventure. 3 out of 5. Genuine adventure elements. Expect the unexpected. Nevada's remote desert terrain and state park camping setting delivers adventure factor. Logistics. 2 out of 5. You'll figure it out. Eventually. Camping at Beaver Dam State Park handles lodging, but organizer Dawn Andone warns 'the closest town is 35 miles down a gravel road. Length. 2 out of 5. Short but honest about it. Dawn Andone notes 'riders usually complete the course in six hours' for the 50-mile distance. Technicality. 2 out of 5. Mild technical demands. Pick decent tires. Coach Mark Orton describes surfaces that 'vary from hard-packed dirt to softball-sized rocks. Elevation. 2 out of 5. Some ups and downs. Manageable. Course travels 'along the rim of the park so you can see all the geologic formations' at approximately 5,000 feet elevation. Climate. 2 out of 5. Weather cooperates more often than not. 2021 temperatures reached 106°F during the event, while 33 riders 'battled the wind' in 2022. Altitude. 2 out of 5. Negligible altitude effect. The course runs at approximately 5,000 feet elevation through Beaver Dam State Park.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: And the rest of the scorecard. Race Quality. 2 out of 5. Nothing special about the race execution. Experience. 2 out of 5. Pleasant enough. Won't change your life. Community. 2 out of 5. Some community spirit. Nothing organized. Expenses. 2 out of 5. Reasonable costs. Plan a modest budget. Prestige. 1 out of 5. Zero name recognition. Field Depth. 1 out of 5. Small field. You might podium by showing up.
